front: I'm known as the fastest land animal. Zoom! Zoom! Who am I?
I can imitate human speech and I love crackers! Squawk! Who am I?
I have a long neck and I love the taste of leaves from tall trees. Who am I?
I'm a big fan of bamboo and I'm black and white. Who am I?
You might catch me doing flips in the ocean, and I'm known for my smile. Who am I?
I wear a spikey suit of armor and like to curl up into a ball. Who am I?
I'm the tallest animal on the planet. Head up, way up! Who am I?
With my black and white stripes, I blend into tall grass. Hurry! Find me!
I might be small, but I have a mighty trunk and big ears! Who am I?
I'm a master of disguise and change colors based on my mood. Who am I?
